name: ev-server
description: Backend for Electric Vehicle charging station
author: SAP E-Mobility Labs France <e-mobility@sap.com>

scripts.git:sdiff: git diff && git submodule foreach 'git diff'
scripts.start:dev: npm version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --files --max-old-space-size=4096 -- src/start.ts
scripts.start:dev:debug: npm version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --inspect --files --max-old-space-size=4096 -- src/start.ts
scripts.start:dev:prof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development node -r source-map-support/register --prof -- dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:doctorprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic doctor -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:flameprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic flame -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:bubbleprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic bubbleprof -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:devbuild: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development-build node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:prof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production node -r source-map-support/register --prof dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:doctorprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic doctor -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:flameprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic flame -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:bubbleprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic bubbleprof -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.clean-install: npm version && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clear --force && npm install
scripts.eslint: cross-env TIMING=1 eslint --ext .js,.ts types src test
scripts.eslint:fix: cross-env TIMING=1 eslint --ext .js,.ts --fix types src test
scripts.mochatest:createContext: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/ContextBuilderRunner.ts
scripts.mochatest: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:parallel: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --parallel test/**/*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:nyc: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true nyc mocha --no-parallel test/**/*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:nyc:parallel: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true nyc mocha --parallel test/**/*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:chargingStation: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/OCPP*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:ocpi: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/OCPI*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:tenant: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/*TenantTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:org: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/*OrgTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:setting: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/*SettingTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:user: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/UserTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:siteorg: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/SiteOrgTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:siteareaorg: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/SiteAreaOrgTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:transaction: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/TransactionTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:stat: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/StatisticsTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:auth: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/AuthenticationTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:ocpp: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/OCPP*Test.ts
scripts.mochatest:authentication: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/AuthenticationTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:crypto: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/EncryptionSettingTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:filter: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/FilterTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:tenantsetting: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/ComponentActivationTenantTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:billing: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/BillingTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:stripe: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/BillingStripeIntegrationTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:asset: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/AssetTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:car: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/CarTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:tag: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/TagTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:locking: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/LockingTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:firmwareUpdateStatus: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/FirmwareUpdateStatusTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:smartCharging: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/SmartChargingTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:security: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/SecurityTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:registrationToken: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/RegistrationTokenTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:company: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --no-parallel test/**/CompanyOrgTest.ts
scripts.mochatest:create:utbilling: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TENANT_FILTER=utbilling mocha --no-parallel test/**/ContextBuilderRunner.ts
